QuestData.Title: Flown the Coop!
QuestData.Description: Dumb Goregek stumble into chicken house and let all the chickens go!$B$BThey all around hill - go get chickens back!$B$B<Elder Harkek shoos you away.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Capture 12 Chicken Escapees for Elder Harkek.$B$BIf you lose Dajik's Worn Chalk, speak to Elder Harkek in Frenzyheart Hill.
QuestData.RewardText: Good! I was worried about foodstuffs. I already pretty hungry.$B$BThank you, $r.
